contents.item: Don’t equate effective living to being busy
Life is about fruitfulness
Always live in active consciousness
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
The way you spend your time daily determines how effective your life will be
The ability to be intense in whatever you do is a key factor in reclaiming your lost years
Reproduce yourself and fulfill your calling
Everything in existence was gotten from the currency of time
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
Living in active consciousness is being in the “here and now
Life is not about longevity but about effectiveness
Purposefully dedicating time into developing yourself is one of the keys to being effective in life
Time spent adding value is not wasted
Live your life for the advancement of the Kingdom
If your idea is not against your conscience or the will of God, go for it
Always live in the here and now
Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength
Our ability to convert time determines how great we will become
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
Always be organized in adding value
You have to be pragmatic, purposeful and goal-oriented to be fully effective
When you are intense, you will do things persistently and with speed
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
You must add value to yourself to be relevant
Your net worth comes from your added value
Make sure everything you do is targeted at yielding maximum results
You don’t count or matter when you don’t live an effective life
The only people remembered in history are the ones that dedicate their lives to service and purpose
Things done for self don’t count in living an effective life
Your calling is in what you often think about
For your life to count, you need to begin to live for others
You need to do an inventory of yourself to discover your calling and purpose
Your intensity increases your net worth
Being dynamic doesn’t necessarily mean you live an effective life
You need intensity to be quick
You have to be skillful in your time management to be effective in life
You have to be skillful in your time management to be productive
You have to be purposeful and intense to reclaim your lost years
Always have a list of what you want to achieve in life
Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
Everything you have was bought with the currency of time
All you do out of selfish reasons is a waste
The doctrine of waiting for confirmation is one of the greatest time killers
Your net worth determines how valuable you are in the sight of men
Invest in your purpose and land of promise
The key to an effective life is that things done for self don’t count
An effective life is a life of purpose
You don’t need any confirmation if you are already in the spirit
You must live a life of love to live an effective life
Life was given to be lived for God and people
Greatness is the quality of time converted into production or value
God is waiting on you to believe that you are capable
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
To be productive, you have to stop being absent-minded
Effectiveness of life is not in self aggrandising
A busy life is not necessarily an effective life
Use your resources wisely and spend quality time on developing your resources
Living a selfish life is a recipe for disaster
There is no limitation in God
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
Every fragment of time that passes daily must be converted for it to be fully effective
The primary thing that determines how effective your life is how you carry out your calling
Time wasters are life wasters
It’s either you are converting your time or not
Everything looks for you when you become great
Self-denial is the first quality of love
Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
A selfish living is a wasteful living
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
Having a job is being busy
When” answers the question on time which is the currency of time
Throw away the doctrine of waiting for confirmation
Our target as believers is to live an effective life, not just a long one
You have to discover your area of talent to be effective
You must be able to bring relevance to people
The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
Conversion is the key to maintaining wealth
To live a selfish life is the fastest track to catastrophe
You are the center of your life
We were sent to earth to fulfill our mandate and life’s purpose
When you increase and multiply, you get much more influence and reach beyond your imagination
Learn to do everything with speed to be efficient and effective
An effective life is a selfless one
The only limitation we have is the limitation of the mind
Be organized in maximizing time
Your gift or calling enables you to ask the question of what to do
The secret of effective living is detachment
Love is about self-denial
We are capable of anything and everything
Gain great values by converting your time
